page.title: 03SCHOOLS IN MOOREND
page.content: To get to school you had to walk two miles. Now we have two first schools and a middle school which are'nt very far away for the children to walk to. School times were 9-12 and 1.30-4. If you were late you were caned. There was West Road Infants and the other first school and the Senior Girls' School in Moorends. The Senior Boys' School was in Thorne. Now you automatically go to the Grammar School, but before this you had to pass the 11+ exam to get into the school. If you did not pass you went to the appropriate senior school. At school the main playground games for girls were skipping and hopscotch. The boys played whip and top. After school girls had to help mum at home. Most people sent their children to bed about half past seven.
